ComicInfo.Title: Issue 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
An all-new Highlander mini-series event spanning the ages as Connor MacLeod searches for the lost sword of his mentor, Ramirez!
JT (Mike Turner's Fathom) Krul provides the incredible script which spans the Highlander mythos, while fan-favorite artist Carlos Rafael provides the stunning visuals (and connecting covers!)
